tasks.compile:mac64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o bin/midi-control-darwin-aarch64 main.tsx
tasks.compile:mac86: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o bin/midi-control-darwin-x86_64 main.tsx
tasks.compile:linux86: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/midi-control-linux-x86_64 main.tsx
tasks.compile:linux64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu -o bin/midi-control-linux-aarch64 main.tsx
tasks.compile:win64: deno compile -A --include web/dist --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o bin/midi-control-windows-x86_64.exe main.tsx
